solution_line_template: If sharks are twice the number of stingrays, then the number of sharks at the aquarium is {multiplier_sharks_stingrays} sharks/stingray * {num_stingrays} stingrays = <<{multiplier_sharks_stingrays}*{num_stingrays}={num_sharks}>>{num_sharks} sharks
The number of fish in the tank is {num_sharks} sharks + {num_stingrays} stingrays = <<{num_sharks}+{num_stingrays}={total_fish}>>{total_fish} fish
